All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractArgs
A class that should inherit all classes that provide command line arguments.
AddNote
Add new note.
App
Main note class.
BadInputException
An exception that is thrown if the number of entered keys is different from 1.
DataConfig
Date view configurations.
DefaultArgs
Default arguments of command line.
Invoker
The class that calls the operations.
JsonReader
Reader of jsons.
JsonWriter
Writer of jsons.
NoteIn
Class which represent input note.
NoteNotFoundException
The exception that is thrown when the deletion note is not found.
NoteOperation
This interface must be implemented by all classes of operations.
NoteOut
Class which represent output note.
Operation
An annotation that defines classes of operations.
OperationDescription
Class that represent operation in Map.
OperationListener
Class that analise args of command line.
OperationNotFoundException
The exception that is thrown when the inferred operation is not found.
RemoveNote
Remove note.
ShowAllNotes
Show all notes.
ShowNotesWithRestrictions
Show notes with restrictions.
